availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, resident. Resident of Campbell County in 1860. Juror on the November 1863 term of the Campbell County Circuit Court. Signed a petition on behalf of Frederick Ampher to Thomas Bramlette, dated December 1, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Brooklyn, p. 665, 668.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Grants Lick, p. 230A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Campbell County, Dayton, p. 199A.
